Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman

Translations.Text: Futhi impoqo yethu ayiyilutho ngaphandle kokucwazima kweso okukodwa
Futhi ngempela sababhubhisa abafana nani ngakho-ke ngakube ukhona yini okhumbulayo na
Futhi zonke izinto abazenzayo zishicilelwe kwiZubur (incwadi ekushicilelwa kuyona izenzo zabo)
Futhi konke okuncane nokukhulu kushicilelwe phansi (kulotshiwe)
Ngempela abalungileyo bayokuba sezivandeni nasemifuleni
Esihlalweni seqiniso eduzane neNkosi enkulu eyenza (zonke izinto)
(UMvelinqangi) onomusa

Futhi izinkanyezi kanye nezihlahla kokubili (kukhothamela umthetho kaMvelinqangi)
Nezulu waliphakamisa wayesebeka isikalo
Ukuze ningoni esikalini
Futhi niqaphele isisindo ngobulungiswa, futhi ningasinciphisi isilinganiso
Futhi umhlaba wawubekela izidalwa
Lapho phakathi kukhona izithelo, nezihlahla zamasundu ezinezixheke
